page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT/POP MUSIC
page.content: These are the views of Helen,a twelve year old pupil of Sholing Middle School.****************************** Nowadays pop music is very popular with the younger generation.A few of the most favoured groups at the moment are {WHAM!,Eurithmics,Madonna}and{ {Tears for Fears}.Last week-end (13/07/85) many of the world's pop stars got together(led by{Bob Geldof}) and they performed in the largest pop concert ever(held in Britain and America).They did this to raise money for famine relief.They called themselves {Band Aid}and the concert {Live Aid}. My favourite group is {WHAM!}which is {George Michael}and{Andrew Ridgeley}. Andrew is really nice and has lovely brown eyes.I think George Michael is a show off but most people love him!
